title: Use of aromatic plants and essential oils in the teaching of physics and chemistry to enhance motivation and sustainability awareness among primary education trainee teachers
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Lorena Gutiérrez-García, Jesús Sánchez-Martín, José Blanco-Salas, Trinidad Ruiz-Téllez, Isaac Corbacho-Cuello
